script_functionality.purpose: Calculate the minimum distance and number of contacts between two groups of atoms (htau401 and htau402) in a molecular dynamics simulation.
steps: Define the number of processors based on the allocated nodes.
Iterate through three lambda values (1.00, 1.10, 1.12) within each directory.
Create a 'data' directory within each lambda directory.
Use gmx make_ndx to define two groups of atoms (htau401 and htau402) based on residue numbers.
Use gmx mindist to calculate the minimum distance and number of contacts between the two groups of atoms using trajectory (prodrun_nopbc.xtc) and topology (prodrun.tpr) files.
Save the results to files named 'data/htau401_htau402_mindist_lambda${i}.xvg' and 'data/htau401_htau402_numcont_lambda${i}.xvg'.
